word:
Jesus says, "Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in His sight: for by the law is the knowledge of sin. But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested, being witnessed by the law and the prophets; Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe: for there is no difference" (Romans 3:20-22).--Letter 230, 1908, pp. 1,2. (To A. T. Jones, July 25, 1908.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. August 29, 1979
